settings.text:
Run, walk, cycle, swim, skydive, get muddy or come up with your own challenge! 

If Aphasia Support is a cause close to your heart, we’d love for you to join team Aphasia Support and represent us at some of the UK’s flagship challenge events. 

Whether you’ve secured your own place, or would like to ask if we can purchase one for you – we’re here to help!

Simply scroll down to discover some of our upcoming events, or get in touch to find out how we can help. 

Upcoming Events:

September

  • 1st – Middlesbrough 10k
  • 15th – Bury 10k
  • 29th – Sheffield 10k

October 

  • 20th – Yorkshire Marathon
  • 20th – YM Team Relay
  • 20th – Yorkshire 10 Mile

*We kindly ask all challenge participants to raise a minimum of £150 in aid of Aphasia Support. If the charity purchases a place on your behalf, you may be asked to pay a non-refundable deposit to cover the cost of your place.
